Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

Morceaux de salon, op. 10

1894

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 28' 30"

  • 1. Nocturne in A minor
  • 2. Valse in A major
  • 3. Barcarolle in G minor
  • 4. Mélodie in E minor
  • 5. Humoresque in G major
  • 5. Humoresque in G major (1940 version)
  • 6. Romance in F minor
  • 7. Mazurka in D-flat major

Recommended editions

  • Russian Music Publishing · 3402 · Pieces II · ed. Valentin Antipov [with both versions of no. 5]

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3
